sentence.Network_en: However, there were two disagreements among some Asian and European participants at the colloquium.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而, 与会的亚洲和欧洲代表在两方面出现意见分歧.

sentence.Network_en: He was not willing to attend the colloquium.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不愿参加这个学术讨论会。

sentence.Network_en: The doctor collectivity that attends colloquium stands up, applause ardently.
sentence.Network_cn: 参加讨论会的医生全体起立, 热烈鼓掌.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 国际会议产业概貌 ... 大会（ convention） 讨论会（ colloquium） 演讲（ lecture）.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... colloquy n 谈话 colloquium n 学术讨论会 eloquence n 雄辩，口才.
英语四千单词百日通(2) - 和平的日志 - 网易博客 ... colloquist n 谈话者，对谈者 colloquium n 讨论会，报告 colloquy n 谈话.
古典文献学英汉词汇（三） ... colloquial language,proverb 俗语 colloquium 专题座谈会 collotype 珂罗版.

list.abs: the Hamburg colloquium , we agreed that our record achievements in the field of human rights the past 50 years , contained at least three flaws .在汉堡大会上，我们都同意这50年来我们争取人权的记录中有至少三项缺点。
Last October , I co - chaired a colloquium on labour relations at the Hague , in the Netherlands ., 去年十月 , 我共在海牙担任在劳资关系上的一个讨论会 , 在荷兰.
The doctor collectivity that attends colloquium stands up , applause ardently ., 参加讨论会的医生全体起立 , 热烈鼓掌.
landscape architecture and environmental planning colloquium ., 景观设计和环境规划研讨.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting a conversation or dialogue): from Latin, from colloqui 'to converse', from col- 'together' + loqui 'to talk'

means.word_mean: 1. an academic meeting or seminar usually led by a different lecturer and on a different topic at each meeting
2. an address to an academic meeting or seminar
